name: Evil Beneath
description:
In this retro PS1/PSX style game. Play as a reporter (Rosa Salinas) investigating strange phenomenon regarding people mysteriously disappearing after visiting a particular mansion located deep inside a forest. During your investigation you will encounter horrifying creatures ready to tear you limb from limb and devour you alive. Traverse your way through these monstrous creatures and discover the terrifying truths about the mansion in the forest, while trying to make your escape before it's to late.

Rich First Person story
Discover the truth about the horrors surrounding the mansion in the forest and the sudden disappearances of the anyone who visits it.



Immersive Experience
Classic Retro PS1/PSX graphics, minimal user interfaces, and with an ambience the will ensure an immersive experience.



Visceral Horror and Suspense
Enter a frightening world filled with horrifying thrills, disturbing moments, and jump scares.



Encounter Disturbing Enemies
Survive the onslaught of horrifying creatures from zombies to giant spiders, ready to rip you apart.



A Spine-Chilling Reimagining of Classic Horror Games
A deeper narrative horror experience that is similar to retro horror classics with modern graphics and functionality.



Resource Management
Search the surrounding areas to scavenge the limited resources available to help aid you in traversing through the monster infested forest.
